feature_evidence.json: Contains feature-to-file mapping and metadata showing which frontend files implement specific product features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short descriptions of all major frontend components, hooks, and styles for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, theming, and base styling for the site.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app into the root container.

frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Responsive header with logo and navigation, including a mobile sheet menu and smooth scroll links.
frontend/src/components/site/HeroSection: Hero section with headline, description, buttons that scroll to sections, and a hero image.
frontend/src/components/site/InquiryList: Debug component showing a collapsible table of inquiries fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/components/site/ProductCate: Displays predefined product categories in cards with item lists.
frontend/src/components/site/ScrollToSec: Accessible link component that scrolls smoothly to a target section on click or keypress.
frontend/src/components/site/Section.tsx: Wraps content in a styled section with optional ID and container layout.
frontend/src/components/site/ServicesSec: Shows service cards with icons and descriptions, followed by product categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiryList.ts: Fetches a list of inquiries from the backend using the current actor.
Validates and submits inquiry forms to the backend, managing submission state and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handles login/logout, and loads stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/serviceInterest.ts: Defines service interest options and helper functions to map between frontend values and backend enum labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, requirements, and image assets for the NK SYSTECH website.
